*** ** *** **** ****** *** I will be a repeat to her

i had a worse experience owing to Practo though. ASter doesnt honour practo book and ASter management in terms of parking support or customer care lady on the board line are very unprofessional etc.....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: **** ******** *** *** **** ***********.she has treated my entire family and all are different age groups right from 96 years to 24 years.her investigation style is awesome and easily identify the issues and gives best easy possible solutions.she allows patient to talk and listen everything with calm.she don't ask many tests and reports ,if require only she will suggest.patient will be very confident after having consultation  with doctor.Thank you Doctor for all the support and you are a wonderful doctor.I strongly recommend her for all sort of issues.Thank you,Gowtam samrat.
Great doctor.. she never asks for unnecessary reports.. her medicines have remarkably worked.. the best in internal medicine
A very satisfactory consultation with a very friendly doctor.... I strongly recommend her to all who seek the help of

Doctor was really good, she patiently listened and explained us the potential resolution.

But the staff seams clueless with high waiting time.

Doctor is extremely thorough with the diagnosis, takes time to explain the condition in detail and suggest lifestyle changes and medication necessary. A thorough professional and extremely courteous. Would highly recommend her.
Doctor listened our concern patiently. We can see positive changes from Day 1. I would recommend her undoubtedly.

review: She is very patient and listens to you before starting to speak. Explains the problem to the patient in detail. Happy with the medication also. Encouraged lifestyle changes to avoid long term intake of medicines.

review: She is patient and explains things which helped us . Though the wait time and the  booking management is worse at Manipal Whitefield .
